00026 Home::Home(WContainerWidget *parent)
00027   : WContainerWidget(parent)
00028 {
00029   WTable *topLayout = new WTable(this);
00030 
00031   WTable *header = new WTable(topLayout->elementAt(0, 0));
00032   WImage *icon = new WImage("uiloog.jpg", header->elementAt(0, 0));
00033   icon->setMargin(WLength(15));
00034 
00035   new WText("<h1>Wt: a C++ Web Toolkit</h1>", header->elementAt(0, 1));
00036   if (!wApp->environment().javaScript()) {
00037     new WText("<i>(non-javascript version)</i>",
00038               header->elementAt(0, 1));
00039   }
00040 
00041   WTable *body = new WTable(topLayout->elementAt(1, 0));
00042   WStackedWidget *contents = new WStackedWidget(body->elementAt(0, 1));
00043 
00044   /*
00045    * Wrap the menu in a rounded widget.
00046    */
00047   RoundedWidget *rounded = new RoundedWidget(RoundedWidget::All,
00048                                              body->elementAt(0, 0));
00049   rounded->setBackgroundColor(WColor(247,236,111));
00050   rounded->resize(WLength(18, WLength::FontEx), WLength());
00051   rounded->setMargin(WLength(15), Right);
00052 
00053   WMenu *menu = new WMenu(contents, WMenu::Vertical, rounded->contents());
00054 
00055   menu->setStyleClass("menu");
00056 
00057   body->elementAt(0, 0)->setContentAlignment(AlignTop | AlignLeft);
00058   body->elementAt(0, 1)->setContentAlignment(AlignTop | AlignLeft);
00059 
00060   menu->addItem("Introduction", introduction());
00061   menu->addItem("News", news(), WMenuItem::PreLoading);
00062   menu->addItem("Status", status(), WMenuItem::PreLoading);
00063   menu->addItem("Features", features(), WMenuItem::PreLoading);
00064   menu->addItem("Documentation", documentation(), WMenuItem::PreLoading);
00065   menu->addItem("Examples", examples(), WMenuItem::PreLoading);
00066   menu->addItem("Download", download(), WMenuItem::PreLoading);
00067   menu->addItem("Community", community(), WMenuItem::PreLoading);
00068 
00069   menu->enableBrowserHistory("main");
00070 
00071   menu->itemSelected.connect(SLOT(this, Home::changeTitle));
00072 }
00073 
00074 void Home::changeTitle(WMenuItem *item)
00075 {
00076   wApp->setTitle(L"Wt, C++ Web Toolkit - " + item->text().value());
00077 }

00080 {
00081   return new WText(tr("home.intro"));

00084 void Home::refresh()
00085 {
00086   readNews(recentNews_, "latest-news.txt");
00087   readNews(historicalNews_, "historical-news.txt");
00088   readReleases(releases_, "releases.txt");
00089 
00090   WContainerWidget::refresh();
00091 }
00092 
00093 WWidget *Home::news()
00094 {
00095   WContainerWidget *result = new WContainerWidget();
00096 
00097   result->addWidget(new WText("<h2><span>Latest News</span></h2>"));
00098   recentNews_ = new WTable();
00099   readNews(recentNews_, "latest-news.txt");
00100   result->addWidget(recentNews_);
00101 
00102   result->addWidget(new WText("<h2><span>Historical News</span></h2>"));
00103   historicalNews_ = new WTable();
00104   readNews(historicalNews_, "historical-news.txt");
00105   result->addWidget(historicalNews_);
00106 
00107   return result;
00108 }

00125 WWidget *Home::helloWorldExample()
00126 {
00127   WContainerWidget *result = new WContainerWidget();
00128 
00129   new WText(tr("home.examples.hello"), result);
00130 
00131   WTreeNode *tree = makeTreeMap("Hello world", 0);
00132   makeTreeFile("hello.C", tree);
00133 
00134   tree->expand();
00135 
00136   result->addWidget(tree);
00137 
00138   return result;
00139 }

00141 WWidget *Home::homepageExample()

00146

00148   WTreeNode *home = makeTreeMap("class Home", tree);
00149   makeTreeFile("Home.h", home);
00150   makeTreeFile("Home.C", home);
00151   WTreeNode *treeexample = makeTreeMap("class TreeListExample", tree);
00152   makeTreeFile("TreeListExample.h", treeexample);
00153   makeTreeFile("TreeListExample.C", treeexample);
00154   makeTreeFile("wt-home.xml", tree);
00155 
00156   tree->expand();
00157 
00158   result->addWidget(tree);
00159 
00160   return result;

00352 WWidget *Home::examples()
00353 {
00354   WContainerWidget *result = new WContainerWidget();
00355 
00356   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.examples")));
00357 
00358   WStackedWidget *exampleStack = new WStackedWidget();
00359 
00360   /*
00361    * Wrap the menu in a rounded widget.
00362    */
00363   RoundedWidget *rounded = new RoundedWidget(RoundedWidget::All, result);
00364   rounded->setBackgroundColor(WColor(0xE0,0xE8,0xFF));
00365 
00366   WMenu *exampleMenu = new WMenu(exampleStack, WMenu::Horizontal,
00367                                  rounded->contents());
00368   exampleMenu->setStyleClass("menu");
00369 
00370   result->addWidget(exampleStack);
00371 
00372   exampleMenu->addItem("Hello world", helloWorldExample());
00373   exampleMenu->addItem("Form", formExample());
00374   exampleMenu->addItem("Wt homepage", homepageExample());
00375   exampleMenu->addItem("Treelist", treelistExample());
00376   exampleMenu->addItem("Hangman", hangmanExample());
00377   exampleMenu->addItem("Style", styleExample());
00378   exampleMenu->addItem("Mail composer", composerExample());
00379   exampleMenu->addItem("Drag &amp; Drop", dragdropExample());
00380   exampleMenu->addItem("File explorer", fileExplorerExample());
00381 
00382   exampleMenu->enableBrowserHistory("example");
00383 
00384   return result;
00385 }

00387 WWidget *Home::download()
00388 {
00389   WContainerWidget *result = new WContainerWidget();
00390   result->addWidget(new WText("<h2><span>Download</span></h2>"));
00391   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.download.license")));
00392   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.download.requirements")));
00393   result->addWidget(new WText("<h3>Available packages</h3>"));
00394 
00395   releases_ = new WTable();
00396   readReleases(releases_, "releases.txt");
00397   result->addWidget(releases_);
00398 
00399   result->addWidget
00400     (new WText("<p>Older releases are still available at "
00401                + href("http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?"
00402                       "group_id=153710#files",
00403                       "sourceforge.net")
00404                + "</p>"));
00405 
00406   return result;
00407 }

00409 std::string Home::href(const std::string url, const std::string description)
00410 {
00411   return "<a href=\"" + url + "\" TARGET=\"_blank\">" + description + "</a>";
00412 }

00414 WWidget *Home::community()
00415 {
00416   return new WText(tr("home.community"));

00418 
00419 void Home::readNews(WTable *newsTable, const std::string newsfile)
00420 {
00421   std::ifstream f(newsfile.c_str());
00422 
00423   newsTable->clear();
00424 
00425   int row = 0;
00426 
00427   while (f) {
00428     std::string line;
00429     getline(f, line);
00430 
00431     if (f) {
00432       typedef boost::tokenizer<boost::escaped_list_separator<char> >
00433         CsvTokenizer;
00434       CsvTokenizer tok(line);
00435 
00436       CsvTokenizer::iterator i=tok.begin();
00437 
00438       newsTable->elementAt(row, 0)->
00439         addWidget(new WText("<p><b>" + *i + "</b></p>"));
00440       newsTable->elementAt(row, 0)
00441         ->setContentAlignment(AlignCenter | AlignTop);
00442       newsTable->elementAt(row, 0)
00443         ->resize(WLength(16, WLength::FontEx), WLength());
00444       newsTable
00445         ->elementAt(row, 1)->addWidget(new WText("<p>" + *(++i) + "</p>"));
00446 
00447       ++row;
00448     }
00449   }
00450 }
00451 
00452 void Home::readReleases(WTable *releaseTable, const std::string releasefile)
00453 {
00454   std::ifstream f(releasefile.c_str());
00455 
00456   releaseTable->clear();
00457 
00458   releaseTable->elementAt(0, 0)->addWidget(new WText("<b>Version</b>"));
00459   releaseTable->elementAt(0, 1)->addWidget(new WText("<b>Date</b>"));
00460   releaseTable->elementAt(0, 2)->addWidget(new WText("<b>Description</b>"));
00461 
00462   releaseTable->elementAt(0, 0)->resize(WLength(10, WLength::FontEx),
00463                                         WLength());
00464   releaseTable->elementAt(0, 1)->resize(WLength(15, WLength::FontEx),
00465                                         WLength());
00466 
00467   int row = 1;
00468 
00469   while (f) {
00470     std::string line;
00471     getline(f, line);
00472 
00473     if (f) {
00474       typedef boost::tokenizer<boost::escaped_list_separator<char> >
00475         CsvTokenizer;
00476       CsvTokenizer tok(line);
00477 
00478       CsvTokenizer::iterator i=tok.begin();
00479 
00480       std::string version = *i;
00481       releaseTable->elementAt(row, 0)->addWidget
00482         (new WText(href("http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/witty/wt-"
00483                         + version + ".tar.gz?download", "Wt " + version)));
00484       releaseTable->elementAt(row, 1)->addWidget(new WText(*(++i)));
00485       releaseTable->elementAt(row, 2)->addWidget(new WText(*(++i)));
00486 
00487       ++row;
00488     }
00489   }
00490 }
00491 
00492 WTreeNode *Home::makeTreeMap(const std::string name, WTreeNode *parent)
00493 {
00494   WIconPair *labelIcon
00495     = new WIconPair("icons/yellow-folder-closed.png",
00496                     "icons/yellow-folder-open.png", false);
00497 
00498   WTreeNode *node = new WTreeNode(name, labelIcon, parent);
00499   node->label()->setFormatting(WText::PlainFormatting);
00500 
00501   if (!parent) {
00502     node->setImagePack("icons/");
00503     node->expand();
00504     node->setLoadPolicy(WTreeNode::NextLevelLoading);
00505   }
00506 
00507   return node;
00508 }
00509 
00510 WTreeNode *Home::makeTreeFile(const std::string name, WTreeNode *parent)
00511 {
00512   WIconPair *labelIcon
00513     = new WIconPair("icons/document.png",
00514                     "icons/yellow-folder-open.png", false);
00515 
00516   return new WTreeNode("<a href=\"" + name + "\" TARGET=\"_BLANK\">"
00517                        + name + "</a>", labelIcon, parent);
00518 }
00519 
00520 WApplication *createApplication(const WEnvironment& env)
00521 {
00522   WApplication *app = new WApplication(env);
00523   app->messageResourceBundle().use("wt-home", false);
00524   app->useStyleSheet("home.css");
00525   app->setTitle("Wt, C++ Web Toolkit");
00526 
00527   new Home(app->root());
00528   return app;
00529 }
00530 
00531 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00532 {
00533   return WRun(argc, argv, &createApplication);
00534 }
